channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Plus puissante sans Windows ? La Lenovo Legion Go 2 s’offre une transformation surprise dés le mois prochain
item.description: La Lenovo Legion Go 2 pourrait s'offrir une version sans Windows, mais avec SteamOS, et ce dès le mois prochain.

item.title: Quels Apple AirPods choisir : le comparatif
item.description: Souvent imités, mais jamais égalés, les écouteurs AirPods d'Apple ne sont pas si nombreux. Toutefois, il existe plusieurs appareils audio Apple différents portant cette nomenclature. Vous ne savez pas quels AirPods choisir ? Suivez notre guide !

item.title: The Fujifilm Instax Mini 12 is our favorite instant camera — and it's now down to a record-low price on Amazon
item.description: The beginner-friendly Fujifilm Instax Mini 12 is now only $85.95 at Amazon

item.title: For a relatively cheap device, the I found the Alldocube IWork GT Ultra is an impressively specified Intel 2-in-1 tablet
item.description: The Alldocube IWork GT Ultra is an Intel-based tablet that, with a flexible keyboard, can be used as a highly mobile laptop.

item.title: iPhone : Apple s’ouvre au Japon et en profite pour mettre la pression sur l’Europe
item.description: L'iPhone s'ouvre au Japon sous la contrainte d'une nouvelle loi mais contre toute attente, Apple ne boude pas son plaisir. La firme californienne encense le modèle japonais pour mieux dénoncer la régulation européenne, jugée dangereuse et bureaucratique.

item.title: Salesmate CRM review
item.description: Salesmate stands out with its modern interface, robust automation features, and comprehensive sales tools. While it may be pricier than some competitors, its time-saving capabilities and in-depth analytics make it a valuable investment for businesses seeking to optimize their sales operations and customer relationships. That said, the lack of enterprise-level features may be a deterrent for larger businesses with complex needs....

item.title: Bethesda reportedly held a secret Starfield event to showcase an upcoming update that will add faster loading times and technical improvements to the Creation Engine, along with a PS5 port that will be announced in 2026
item.description: Starfield is reportedly getting a major update in early 2026 that will improve space flight loading screens and the game's Creation Engine, as well as announcements for the PlayStation 5 and Nintendo Switch 2 ports.

item.title: Save on Crunchyroll annual subscriptions this holiday season
item.description: If you're struggling to find your next binge-watch, you can't go wrong with anime. For the holidays, you can save on a Crunchyroll subscription, giving you access to its vast library of anime series to watch. Through December 29, you can sign up for an annual Fan subscription for $67, down from the usual $80, or a Mega Fan subscription for $100, down from $120. While both the Fan and Mega Fan plans are ad-free, you do get some different benefits depending on which you decide to pay for. Fan subscribers get full access to Crunchyroll's library, new episodes "shortly after they air in Japan" and...

item.title: Trump Media is merging with fusion power company TAE Technologies in $6B+ deal
item.description: The merger would broaden Trump Media’s holdings into the nascent fusion power space while data centers clamor for more electricity amid the ongoing AI boom.

item.title: Watch Live as Interstellar Comet 3I/ATLAS Makes Its Closest Approach to Earth
item.description: This will be your best chance to see 3I/ATLAS in the night sky.

item.title: 26 practical smart home gifts that make everyday life a little easier
item.description: Smart home products are all about making everyday life a little easier, which is why they're some of the best and most thoughtful gifts you can give. Some people go all out building a multi-gadget IoT kingdom (like our resident smart home expert, Jen Pattison Tuohy), but a smart home is whatever your recipient wants […]

item.title: Netflix snags Elle Duncan from ESPN to host live events
item.description: Netflix is bringing ESPN host Elle Duncan onboard to become the voice of its growing roster of live events. Duncan, who has appeared on SportsCenter, College GameDay, and WNBA Countdown, will make her debut on Netflix with next year's Skyscraper Live broadcast. During the livestream, free solo climber Alex Honnold will attempt to ascend the […]

item.title: Anthropic launches enterprise ‘Agent Skills’ and opens the standard, challenging OpenAI in workplace AI
item.description: Anthropic said on Wednesday it would release its Agent Skills technology as an open standard, a strategic bet that sharing its approach to making AI assistants more capable will cement the company's position in the fast-evolving enterprise software market.The San Francisco-based artificial intelligence company also unveiled organization-wide management tools for enterprise customers and a directory of partner-built skills from companies including Atlassian, Figma, Canva, Stripe, Notion, and Zapier.The moves mark a significant expansion of a technology Anthropic first introduced in October, tra...

item.title: Test du Motorola Edge 70 : ultrafin et moins cher qu’un iPhone Air, a-t-il trouvé la recette ultime ?
item.description: Le nouveau smartphone de Motorola mise tout sur son épaisseur réduite et son poids minimal, au risque de frustrer certains utilisateurs, en quête de performances, d'une grande autonomie ou encore d'une certaine polyvalence photographique.

item.title: Voici le meilleur vidéoprojecteur compact de l’année – Frandroid Awards 2025
item.description: Parmi les différents modèles de vidéoprojecteurs testés, le LG CineBeam Q remporte la palme du modèle compact. Découvrez pourquoi il a remporté le Frandroid Awards de sa catégorie.

item.title: Forget Chromebooks - this Windows 11 laptop with an Intel i3 just dropped to under £200 at Currys

item.description: Amazon is bringing back Black Friday prices on its best-selling devices, including up to 50% off Kindle, Echo, Ring Doorbells, Fire TVs, and more

item.title: « De vraies passoires »: les douanes françaises incapables de faire face à l’afflux de colis chinois
item.description: Absence de contrôle, insuffisance des effectifs : les services douaniers français sont totalement dépassés par la vague de petits colis provenant de Chine, estiment des parlementaires français dans un rapport. Les élus listent une série de recommandations pour améliorer la situation.

item.title: Free débloque une fonction bien pratique sur ces Pixel de Google

item.title: Kia and Hyundai will spend millions fixing old cars to stop ‘Kia Boyz’ thefts
item.description: Kia and Hyundai will offer free repairs for millions of cars that lack anti-theft technology as part of a settlement with dozens of US states. The automakers agreed to outfit the roughly nine million eligible cars sold between 2011 and 2022 with a zinc sleeve installed around the ignition cylinder to prevent the viral "Kia […]

item.title: 7 Best Cheap Phones (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: There’s little reason to pay top dollar for a smartphone. These iPhones and Android devices—ranging from $100 to $600—stood up to WIRED’s testing.

item.title: ChatGPT calls this mini PC "a steal" while Gemini says it's "insane" value for money — Meet the $379 AMD Ryzen 7 8745HS powerhouse that AI is raving about
item.description: No other deal touches this Machenike AI mini PC for value - and it boasts an AMD Ryzen 7 8745HS with 16GB of high-speed RAM and a 512GB M.2 SSD.

item.title: Larian Studios CEO says RAM crisis will affect game development – but I think it's actually a blessing in disguise
item.description: Baldur's Gate 3 maker suggests RAM crisis will impact game development, but I don't think that's a bad thing at all.

item.title: As a PC gamer priced out of gaming laptops and PCs, these are the must-have PC gaming handhelds to get this Christmas
item.description: RAM price rises are causing gaming laptops and PCs to get more expensive, but these gaming handhelds offer excellent, more affordable, alternatives.

item.title: iRobot’s bankruptcy isn’t the end — it’s a reboot, says its CEO
item.description: The news that the maker of the Roomba robot vacuum, iRobot, filed for bankruptcy this week came as no surprise. Its CEO, Gary Cohen, had been warning investors all year that the company could run out of cash unless a buyer was found. When its last potential deal fell through, bankruptcy became inevitable. But Cohen […]

item.description: Paul Rudd is bestowed the power of gun by Ice Cube in this Christmas' oddest theatrical release.

item.title: How Atlas Obscura plans to embrace the 3D web
item.description: This is Lowpass by Janko Roettgers, a newsletter on the ever-evolving intersection of tech and entertainment, syndicated just for The Verge subscribers once a week. Atlas Obscura has been crowdsourcing strange and wonderful places from all around the world since its founding in 2009. To date, the site's users and editorial staff have collected and […]...

item.title: TDK Ventures, Accel set to back India’s EtherealX in reusable launch vehicle push: sources
item.description: EtherealX aims to take on SpaceX's Falcon 9 with its fully reusable rocket.

item.title: Alexa+ can now answer your Ring doorbell and talk to people
item.description: Amazon just introduced a new feature for Alexa+ called Greetings. This lets Alexa+ answer the doorbell and converse with visitors, which certainly sounds futuristic in a "gated community as dystopia" kind of way. There are several caveats here. First of all, it only works with certain newer Ring video doorbell models. Customers also have to pony up for a Ring Premium Plan and have access to the Alexa+ early access build. It's available in the US and Canada and only in English. If you meet those criteria, this could be a fairly useful little feature. Amazon says it "transforms your Ring doorbel...

item.title: The Memory Shortage Could End the Era of Physical Games
item.description: Get ready for even more game-key cards on Switch 2.

item.title: Trump administration reveals plans for arms sales to Taiwan, worth over $10 billion
item.description: If Congress approves the sale, it would be the largest-ever U.S. weapons package to Taiwan. The Trump administration has announced a massive package of arms sales to Taiwan valued at more than $10 billion that includes medium-range missiles, howitzers and drones, drawing an angry response from China.The State Department announced the sales late Wednesday during a nationally televised address by President Donald Trump, who made scant mention of foreign policy issues and did not speak about China or Taiwan at all. U.S.-Chinese tensions have ebbed and flowed during Trump’s second term, largely ov...

item.title: Android 16 QPR3 will tell you when an app is using your location
item.description: The latest Android 16 QPR3 beta added a helpful new privacy tool to let you know when your location is being tracked by an app.

item.title: Leapmotor frappe fort et lance ces 3 voitures électriques en Europe, dont une dotée d’un moteur essence
item.description: Le constructeur chinois Leapmotor, sous le giron de Stellantis désormais, arrivera en force au prochain salon de Bruxelles avec trois modèles ambitieux : le SUV B03X en première européenne, et les B05 et la B10 équipée d'une technologie à prolongateur d'autonomie.

item.description: Microsoft has announced a new Fallout crossover that will see the Amazon TV series characters added to Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 and Warzone.

item.title: Tech provider for NHS England confirms data breach
item.description: U.K.-based healthcare tech provider DXS International said it discovered and contained a data breach on Sunday. A ransomware gang took credit for the breach.

item.title: Having Windows app issues? Microsoft is making businesses reach out directly to get a fix
item.description: The December 2025 Patch Tuesday update broke a few things - and the fix is not yet done.

item.title: JetBlue opens its first airport lounge to compete in the luxury lounge boom
item.description: JetBlue’s new BlueHouse lounge, now open at JFK airport, is designed as a hyper-local respite for the airline’s most loyal travelers. A new hotspot just opened in New York—and it’s in terminal 5 of John F. Kennedy International Airport. BlueHouse, a 9,000-square-foot space exclusively available to select JetBlue Airways customers, welcomed its first guests at 5 a.m. this morning as the airline’s first foray into the pitched battle for lucrative premium fliers. ...

item.title: Worried about ransomware? IDrive launches new Salesforce Backup tool for greater data protection
item.description: One of our favorite cloud backup providers is launching a new solution for Salesforce safeguarding.

item.description: The grants involved research studying autism and sudden infant deaths.

item.title: Rivian rolls out new ‘Universal Hands-Free’ driving feature
item.description: The driver assistance software is available on Rivian's for Gen 2 R1 cars and works on 3.5 million miles of North American roads. But it doesn't slow or stop for traffic lights or stop signs.

item.title: La plus grande lune de Saturne n’abriterait pas l’océan attendu, mais quelque chose de peut-être plus prometteur !
item.description: Pendant des années, Titan a été perçue comme un monde abritant un vaste océan d’eau liquide caché sous sa croûte glacée. Mais de nouvelles analyses des données de Cassini bousculent ce scénario bien établi. Et si, au lieu d’un océan global, la plus grande lune de Saturne renfermait une structure...

item.title: Trump wants to make U.S. oil drilling cheap again, and states are bracing for impact. Here’s why
item.description: States like New Mexico rely on oil and gas revenue for investments in programs such as early childhood education. A Republican push to make drilling cheaper on federal land is creating new fiscal pressure for states that depend on oil and gas revenue, most notably in New Mexico as it expands early childhood education and saves for the future.The shift stems from the sweeping law President Donald Trump signed in July that rolls back the minimum federal royalty rate to 12.5%. That rate — the share of production value companies must pay to the government — held steady for a century under the 1920...

item.title: Abonnés Starlink de la première heure : surveillez vos emails, un nouveau routeur gratuit vous attend
item.description: SpaceX lance le remplacement gratuit des routeurs Starlink de première génération. L'entreprise informe ses abonnés par email que ces anciens boîtiers ne recevront bientôt plus de mises à jour. En échange, ils recevront le modèle « Mini », plus récent et performant.

item.title: Young Sherlock teaser gives Arthur Conan Doyles detective an explosive origin story
item.description: Who was Arthur Conan Doyle's detective as a youngster? That's what Guy Ritchie's Prime Video series "Young Sherlock" asks.

item.title: La CAF dément toute intrusion, mais confirme une fuite de données
item.description: Une fuite massive frappe la Caisse des Allocations Familiales (CAF). Des pirates ont pu exfiltrer plus de 22 millions de données personnelles. Plus de huit millions de Français seraient touchés. Les hackers du ministère de l'Intérieur sont bien décidés à montrer qu'ils ne plaisantent pas…La CAF dément toute intrusion dans ses système, mais confirme que des données ont été volées....

item.title: ‘Evangelion’ Will Briefly Return Again for a New 30th Anniversary Short Film
item.description: The short animation, written by Hideaki Anno and helmed by 'Thrice Upon A Time' animation director Naoyuki Asano, will debut during a special three-day 'Evangelion' celebration in February 2026.

item.title: Microsoft’s holiday Copilot ad is wrapped in empty promises
item.description: Microsoft is at it again with another round of ads showing people talking to Copilot AI on their computers. This time it's holiday-themed, including a cameo from the big man in red. The 30-second TV spot asks if you're "ready for the holidays" and features actors in various festive home settings asking Copilot for some […]

item.title: Test du MSI Katana 15 : un PC portable gaming à moins de 1500€, ça vaut quoi ?
item.description: Un PC portable gaming à moins de 1500 euros c'est possible ? C'est la proposition du MSI Katana 15, un modèle abordable qui a cependant du faire quelques concessions en chemin. Voici notre test complet.

item.title: Amazfit T-Rex 3 Pro : voilà une belle réduction pour cette rivale de la Fenix 8 de Garmin
item.description: Avec sa T-Rex 3 Pro, Amazfit propose une montre outdoor capable de rivaliser avec celles de Garmin. Notée 9/10 par nos soins, c'est un modèle que l'on recommande chaudement d'autant plus maintenant qu'elle passe de 399 euros à 379 euros.
